name: Cottages by the Ocean

reviews.text: Cottages by the Ocean are just what the name says. These really are little, individual studio and one bedroom units complete with porches and rockers all assembled around a nicely landscaped courtyard. Best of all, they're only a couple of blocks from the beach. Everything is provided for your trip to the beach, too--portable beach chairs, coolers, even beach toys. Actually that's typical of these places overall--they've outfitted them with everything, from laundry applicances and WIFI to pots, pans, nice china, and even magazines, books and games to play. And the decor is very clean with a nice homey feel. After a day or two you start to feel like it's really your own little cottage in South Florida.
reviews.title: Such a cute, homey little place

likes.liked: — The homey feel of having a cottage rather than a hotel

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed January 2008, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: The Cottages are close to nice restaurants so you wouldn't even need a car if beach and water activities are what you're after. But if you want to take some time away from the beach and see a few sights you'll find that Pompano Beach is perfectly sited in the middle of all the action--Boca and Palm Beach to the North and Ft. Lauderdale and Miami to the South. Besides the more well known sights all those places have, you can also check out less well-known places like Butterfly World and Morikami Japanese Gardens. If you like shopping, besides Worth Avenue in Palm Beach, there's the more affordable gigantic Sawgrass Outlet Mall and the bargain hunters dream--Festival Flea Market.
reviews.title: Wonderful!

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed December 2007, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: There's a lot to do in Pompano Beach and the surrounding areas and Cottages by the Ocean make a wonderful place to stay while you're doing it. You'll find yourself thinking about next year's visit before you've even finished this year's. I know I did.
reviews.title: Christmas in Pompano

aka: Cottages By The Ocean Hotel Pompano Beach
description: This charming complex of six fully restored 1940s studio and one-bedroom cottages is nationally rated as a Superior Small Lodging. It's less than two blocks from our award-winning beach with lifeguards, lighthouse and fishing pier. Enjoy all the comforts of home with king beds, full kitchens, free Internet, BBQ and laundry facilities, screened porches overlooking tropical gardens. Cottages by the Ocean is a small, well-kept property of charming Key West-style studio and one-bedroom cottages. We are a White Glove award-winner and nationally rated as a Superior Small Lodging. Each restored 1940s cottage has a full kitchen, king or queen bed and sleeper sofa, lush, tropical garden views, large screened-in porches or open patio, private BBQ grills, with a central sundeck and coin laundry on site. The Cottages are centrally located on a quiet street in the safe, ocean side community of Pompano Beach, 15 minutes North of downtown Fort Lauderdale and 15 minutes South of Boca Raton. They are less than two blocks from one of South Florida's award-winning Blue Wave beaches (with life guards), and a short walk to dozens of restaurants, shops, nightspots, public fishing pier, snorkel/dive boats, charter fishing boats, jet ski and boat rentals, gym, day spa, drug store, gourmet fish market and more. It’s a five-minute drive to the new Pompano CitiCenter shopping mall, movie theaters, tennis and aquatics complex, dog park, air park for private planes and the Good Year Blimp base, 36-hole golf facility and driving range. The new ISLE Casino (smoke-free), next door to Pompano Harness Track, is a 15-minute drive. I-95 is a 10-minute drive for easy access to all South Florida business centers, shopping and attractions.Very clean, quiet and comfortable.
